00146 int mnt_Mnt( nfs_arg_t             * parg       /* IN      */,
00147              exportlist_t          * pexport    /* IN      */,
00148              fsal_op_context_t     * pcontext   /* IN      */,
00149              cache_inode_client_t  * pclient    /* IN/OUT  */,
00150              hash_table_t          * ht         /* IN/OUT  */, 
00151              struct svc_req        * preq       /* IN      */,
00152              nfs_res_t             * pres       /* OUT     */ ) 
00153 {  
00154   
00155   char    exportPath[MNTPATHLEN + 1];
00156   exportlist_t * p_current_item;
00157 
00158   fsal_handle_t     * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00159   
00160   int auth_flavor[NB_AUTH_FLAVOR] ;
00161   int index_auth = 0 ;
00162   int i = 0  ;
00163   
00164   char                      exported_path[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00165   char                    * hostname ;
00166   
00167   DisplayLogJdLevel(pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "REQUEST PROCESSING: Calling mnt_Mnt, version %u", preq->rq_vers ) ;
00168   
00169   /* Paranoid command to clean the result struct. */
00170   memset( pres, 0, sizeof(nfs_res_t) );
00171 
00172 #ifdef _DETECT_MEMCORRUPT
00173   if (!BuddyCheck( parg->arg_mnt ))
00174   {
00175     fprintf( stderr, "Memory corruption in mnt_Mnt. arg_mnt = %p\n", parg->arg_mnt );
00176   }       
00177 #endif  
00178   
00179   if ( parg->arg_mnt == NULL )
00180   {
00181     DisplayLogJdLevel(pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT, "/!\\ | MOUNT: NULL path passed as Mount argument !!!") ;    
00182     return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00183   }
00184       
00185   /* Retrieving arguments */
00186   strncpy( exportPath, parg->arg_mnt, MNTPATHLEN + 1 );
00187   
00188 
00189   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "MOUNT: Asked path=%s", exportPath ) ;
00190   
00191   
00192   /*
00193    * Find the export for the dirname (using as well Path or Tag ) 
00194    */
00195   for(  p_current_item = pexport ; p_current_item != NULL ; p_current_item = p_current_item->next )
00196     {  
00197       if( exportPath[0] != '/')
00198        {
00199         /* The input value may be a "Tag" */
00200         if( !strcmp( exportPath, p_current_item->FS_tag ) )
00201         {
00202           strncpy( exported_path, p_current_item->fullpath, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00203           break ;
00204         }
00205        }
00206       else
00207        {
00208         if( !strncmp(p_current_item->fullpath, exportPath, MAXPATHLEN ) )
00209           {
00210             strncpy( exported_path, p_current_item->fullpath, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00211             break ;
00212           }
00213        }
00214     }
00215   
00216   /* if p_current_item is not null,
00217    * it points to the asked export entry.
00218    */
00219   
00220   if ( !p_current_item )
00221      {
00222       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT, "MOUNT: Export entry %s not found", exportPath ) ;
00223        
00224       /* entry not found. */
00225       /* @todo : not MNT3ERR_NOENT => ok */
00226        switch( preq->rq_vers )
00227         {
00228         case MOUNT_V1:
00229           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFSERR_ACCES ;
00230           break ;
00231           
00232         case MOUNT_V3:
00233           pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_ACCES;
00234           break ;
00235         }
00236        return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00237     }
00238   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: Export entry Path=%s Tag=%s matches %s, export_id=%u",
00239                      exported_path, p_current_item->FS_tag, exportPath, p_current_item->id ) ;
00240                    
00241   /* @todo : check wether mount is allowed.
00242    *  to do so, retrieve client identifier from the credential.
00243    */
00244   
00245   /*
00246    * retrieve the associated NFS handle
00247    */
00248   
00249   /* Set the FSAL HANDLE (for lighter code) */
00250   pfsal_handle =  p_current_item->proot_handle  ;
00251 
00252   /* convert the fsal_handle to a file handle */
00253   switch( preq->rq_vers )
00254     {
00255     case MOUNT_V1:
00256       if( !nfs2_FSALToFhandle( &(pres->res_mnt1.fhstatus2_u.directory), 
00257                                pfsal_handle, p_current_item ) )
00258         {
00259           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00260         }
00261       else
00262         {
00263           pres->res_mnt1.status = NFS_OK ;
00264         }
00265       break ;
00266       
00267     case MOUNT_V3:
00268       if( ( pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle.fhandle3_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00269         pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_INVAL ; /* BUGAZOMEU: pas forcement le meilleur code retour ... */
00270       else
00271         {
00272           if( !nfs3_FSALToFhandle( (nfs_fh3 *)&(pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle ), 
00273                                    pfsal_handle, p_current_item ) )
00274             {
00275               pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3ERR_INVAL ;
00276             }
00277           else
00278             {
00279               pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status = MNT3_OK ;
00280           
00281           /* Auth et nfs_SetPostOpAttr ici */
00282             }
00283         }
00284       
00285       break ;
00286     }
00287 
00288   /* Return the supported authentication flavor in V3 */
00289   if( preq->rq_vers == MOUNT_V3 )
00290     {
00291       if( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_AUTH_NONE ) auth_flavor[index_auth++] = AUTH_NONE ;
00292       if( p_current_item->options & EXPORT_OPTION_AUTH_UNIX ) auth_flavor[index_auth++] = AUTH_UNIX ;
00293 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00294       if( nfs_param.krb5_param.active_krb5 == TRUE )
00295        {
00296          auth_flavor[index_auth++] =  MNT_RPC_GSS_NONE ;
00297          auth_flavor[index_auth++] =  MNT_RPC_GSS_INTEGRITY ;
00298          auth_flavor[index_auth++] =  MNT_RPC_GSS_PRIVACY ;
00299        }
00300 #endif
00301       
00302       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: Entry support %d different flavours", index_auth ) ;
00303       
00304 #define RES_MOUNTINFO pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo
00305       if( ( RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val = (int*)Mem_Alloc( index_auth * sizeof( int ) ) ) == NULL )
00306         return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00307   
00308       RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_len = index_auth ;
00309       for( i = 0 ; i < index_auth ; i++ )
00310         RES_MOUNTINFO.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val[i] = auth_flavor[i] ;
00311     }
00312   
00313   /* Add the client to the mount list */
00314   /* @todo: BUGAZOMEU; seul AUTHUNIX est supporte */
00315   hostname= ((struct authunix_parms *)(preq->rq_clntcred))->aup_machname ;
00316   
00317   
00318   if( !nfs_Add_MountList_Entry( hostname, exportPath ) )
00319     {
00320       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs,  "MOUNT: /!\\ | Error when adding entry (%s,%s) to the mount list", hostname, exportPath ) ;
00321       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, "MOUNT: /!\\ | Mount command will be successfull anyway" ) ;
00322     }
00323   else
00324     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, "MOUNT: mount list entry (%s,%s) added",  hostname, exportPath ) ;
00325                   
00326   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00327   
00328 } /* mnt_Mnt */
00329 
00339 void mnt1_Mnt_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00340 {
00341   return ;
00342 } /* mnt_Mnt_Free */
00343 
00344 
00345 void mnt3_Mnt_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00346 {
00347   if( pres->res_mnt3.fhs_status == MNT3_OK )
00348     {
00349       Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.auth_flavors.auth_flavors_val) ;
00350       Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_mnt3.mountres3_u.mountinfo.fhandle.fhandle3_val) ;
00351     }
00352   return ;
00353 } /* mnt_Mnt_Free */
